thread.title: Fire damages businesses in Surrey strip mall
thread.title_full: Fire damages businesses in Surrey strip mall

author: Amy Judd
title: Fire damages businesses in Surrey strip mall
text:
February 22, 2017 8:29 am Fire damages businesses in Surrey strip mall By Amy Judd Online News Producer Global News 
The fire broke out in the Surrey strip mall around 1 a.m. Global News What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' editorial staff without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... X What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... - 
Surrey business owners will be assessing the damage today after a fire broke out at a local strip mall overnight. 
Fire crews were called to the corner of King George Boulevard and 108 Avenue around 1 a.m. 
A Subway restaurant was heavily damaged in the fire. 
A nearby liquor store was also affected. 
There are no reports of any injuries at this time but an investigation is underway. Â© 2017 Global News, a division of Corus Entertainment Inc.
